title: Docs & repo alignment (tabs, tools, folder structure)
description: Bring documentation in docs/ and README.md in sync with the actual repository state: UI tabs (Import/AutoBericht/Export), PhotoSorter ownership (Excel vs web), missing vision-critique folder, and current limitations.
acceptance_criteria: - README/docs reflect actual folders and workflows\n- Broken links removed or fixed\n- Optional tools clearly marked and present if referenced
notes: Docs/tasks aligned with VBA-canonical workflow and current repo structure.

title: Track and maintain docs/STATUS.md as the canonical progress snapshot
description: Commit docs/STATUS.md (or replace it with a tracked equivalent) and add a short section to docs/INDEX.md linking to it as the 'current state vs target' document.
acceptance_criteria: - docs/STATUS.md is tracked\n- docs/INDEX.md links to it\n- STATUS.md matches current code+docs
close_reason: Linked docs/STATUS.md from docs/INDEX.md and treated STATUS.md as current progress snapshot

title: Resolve missing vision-critique tool references
description: Either (a) add the vision-critique tool back into the repo, or (b) remove/replace all references to it in README/docs/architecture/system-overview.md/docs/INDEX.md.
acceptance_criteria: - No broken links to vision-critique remain\n- If tool exists, it has README + run instructions\n- If removed, docs no longer imply it's available
notes: Removed vision-critique references; docs now match repo.

title: Docs: reconcile PhotoSorter ownership (Excel vs web UI)
description: Update docs/guides/getting-started.md and docs/guides/html-workflow.md so they match the actual web UI tabs and the intended PhotoSorter workflow (Excel-only vs optional web PhotoSorter).
acceptance_criteria: - Guides do not promise missing tabs/features\n- Photo tagging workflow is unambiguous\n- Cross-links remain valid
notes: Docs updated: photo tagging is Excel PhotoSorter; web UI consumes metadata.

title: README/docs: update repo tree and tool list to match reality
description: Audit README.md and docs/INDEX.md against the actual directory structure (AutoBericht/, macros/, tools/, etc.) and remove stale sections (e.g., python placeholder main.py) or mark them as WIP.
acceptance_criteria: - Top-level README tree matches repo\n- Docs links resolve\n- Stubs are clearly labeled
notes: Updated README/docs structure + tooling references to match repo.

title: Web UI: load/edit/export unified project.json
description: Refactor AutoBericht (AutoBericht/) to use the unified project.json contract (root chapters[].rows[], photos, lists, history) end-to-end: importer/state, UI, and export pipelines.
acceptance_criteria: - AutoBericht imports project.json exported from Excel without manual conversion\n- AutoBericht edits and exports a schema-valid unified project.json\n- PDF/PPTX exporters run off unified chapters/rows

title: AutoBericht: update schema + validation for unified project.json
description: Replace the current projectSchema (which requires report/presentation) with the unified contract from docs/architecture/data-model.md (root chapters[].rows[] etc). Hook AJV validation to show actionable errors in Import/Export tabs.
acceptance_criteria: - AutoBericht validates unified project.json via AJV\n- Validation UI shows clear errors/warnings\n- Legacy schema expectations (report/presentation) removed or migrated
close_reason: AutoBericht schema/validation updated to unified project.json (chapters/rows) with legacy snapshot migration

title: AutoBericht: refactor ProjectState to hydrate unified chapters/rows
description: Update ProjectState.setProjectSnapshot + projectBuilder/reportTree to ingest the unified project.json shape (chapters[].rows[]), including workstate, assets, and exportHints.
acceptance_criteria: - Loading a unified project.json produces a populated reportTree\n- Existing UI interactions update workstate in-memory\n- Save/export emits unified contract
close_reason: ProjectState now hydrates unified project.json and writes edits back into chapters[].rows[]

title: AutoBericht UI: render unified chapters/rows and editors
description: Update AutoBerichtPanel and associated UI components to read/write the unified model (chapter -> rows). Map level selection, include toggles, overrides, done/review, and photo counts to workstate/assets.
acceptance_criteria: - Chapter navigation and finding list work using unified rows\n- Editing updates unified workstate/overrides\n- Photo attachments display from assets.photos
close_reason: AutoBericht UI now renders unified chapters/rows via reportTree reportEntry view-model and edits feed back into workstate

title: PDF exporter: generate report from unified chapters/rows
description: Update AutoBericht/js/exporter/pdfExporter.js to iterate unified chapters[].rows[] with include flags, selectedLevel, overrides, and locale/layout settings.
acceptance_criteria: - PDF export succeeds on a unified project snapshot\n- Include/exclude logic matches workstate/exportHints\n- Output uses branding + TOC
close_reason: PDF exporter now renders unified chapters/rows (with legacy fallback)

title: PPTX exporter: generate decks from unified chapters/rows and photo tags
description: Update AutoBericht/js/exporter/pptxExporter.js to pull finding text + recommendations from unified rows and embed photos referenced in assets/photos.tags.
acceptance_criteria: - Report PPTX exports from unified project snapshot\n- Photo selection respects bericht/seminar/topic tags and/or assets.photos\n- No hard dependency on legacy report.chapters
close_reason: PPTX exporter now uses unified chapters/rows for report deck; seminar deck continues to use photo tags

title: Add unified fixtures + manual round-trip smoke checklist
description: Add fixture JSON(s) for the unified contract and a short smoke-test checklist: Excel export -> AutoBericht import -> edit -> AutoBericht export -> Excel import.
acceptance_criteria: - Unified fixture exists under AutoBericht/fixtures/\n- docs/guides (or docs/reference) includes a 10-minute smoke checklist
close_reason: Added unified AutoBericht fixture and documented round-trip smoke checklist

title: Unify canonical project.json data contract
description: Decide and document the single canonical project.json shape shared by Excel/VBA and AutoBericht, based on docs/architecture/data-model.md, and make web UI + exporters converge on it.
acceptance_criteria: - A single canonical JSON contract is documented and referenced from README/docs\n- AutoBericht schema validation matches the canonical contract\n- Backward-compatibility/migration story is defined

title: Confirm canonical unified project.json and commit current-state doc
description: Use docs/architecture/data-model.md as the canonical contract (root chapters[].rows[]). Commit docs/STATUS.md (or replace with a tracked equivalent) and update docs/architecture/system-overview.md + README.md to clearly state the canonical contract and current mismatch.
acceptance_criteria: - Canonical contract is explicitly stated in docs\n- docs/STATUS.md (or replacement) is tracked and up to date\n- README/docs stop implying multiple incompatible project.json shapes
close_reason: Docs updated to declare unified project.json as canonical and document current AutoBericht mismatch

title: Define migration/adapter strategy for legacy web-ui project snapshots
description: Document and implement (in AutoBericht) how to load older project snapshots that use {report:{chapters:[]},presentation:{...}} into the unified chapters[].rows[] contract.
acceptance_criteria: - Loading legacy snapshots produces a valid unified in-memory project\n- Migration behavior is documented\n- Minimal data loss (logs/warnings for unmapped fields)

title: Add machine-readable schema for unified project.json
description: Add a JSON Schema (draft-07 or 2020-12) for the unified project.json described in docs/architecture/data-model.md, so VBA + AutoBericht can validate the same contract.
